description.en:
The One-stop solution for the NFT Market & built for the Metaverse

ArtWallet is the ultimate wallet for NFT owners. It enables users to store, manage, distribute and discover NFT content, including digital art, collectables, metaverse game items. ArtWallet incorporates a native cross-chain support, particularly NFT bridges between blockchains.

Media delivery vehicle for the playback of unique audio/visual content (imagine Spotify or iTunes via NFTs or VR/AR Showcasing)
Native cross-chain support (NFT bridges between blockchains)
Strongly supported by renowned cybersecurity company Hacken
